polynomial

Class PolynomialTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • polynomial.PolynomialTerm

  • public class PolynomialTerm
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an object that stores a single term of the polynomial. It contains the power and coefficient for the term.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolynomialTerm(int p, int c)
      Creates a polynomial term.

      • PolynomialTerm

        public PolynomialTerm(int p,
                      int c)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a polynomial term.
        Parameters:
        p - The power or degree of the term.
        c - The coefficient of the term.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws an exception when the power is less than 0.
